english: Regulations Governing Awards for the Control of Communicable Diseases
title: 傳染病防治獎勵辦法
history: Formulated and announced in 12 articles by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, on 17 November 2000, under Wei-Shu-Chi-Kuan order No. 0890030199
Amended Articles 5, 7, and 10 and announced by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, on 8 November 2002, under Wei-Shu-Chi-Kuan order No. 0910073484
Amended Article 8 and announced by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, on 21 April 2003, under Shu-Shou-Chi order No. 0920000256

Amended in 13 articles and announced by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, on September 9, 2004, under Shu-Shou-Chi Order No. 0930000747; these amended articles are put into effect on January 1, 2005.

Amended Article 4, Article 5 and Article 13, and deleted Article 10 and Article 11 on September 8, 2006, by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, under Shu-Shou-Chi Order No. 0950000569; these amended articles are put into effect on January 1, 2007.
Amended 11 articles and announced by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, on March 21, 2008, under Shu-Shou-Chi Order No. 0970000217
Amended Articles 3, 5, and 6 and announced by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, on July 24, 2009, under Shu-Shou-Chi Order No. 0980001007

articles.content: This set of Regulations is formulated in accordance with the regulations of Article 73 of the Communicable Disease Control Act (hereafter referred to as the Act).

Those to be awarded under this set of Regulations shall be individuals, medical care (medical) institutions, and other relevant groups with outstanding contributions to the implementation of the communicable disease control operations of the Act.

When persons are entitled to reporting bonuses of varied amounts, the highest amount shall be issued.
When two or more persons report the same case, bonus shall be issued to the first person reporting; when the case is reported simultaneously by them, the bonus shall be evenly issued to them.

Individuals meeting regulations of Subparagraph 2 through Subparagraph 6 of Article 3, shall be issued disease control bonus of no more than NT$ 50,000.
Targets for awards of the preceding Paragraph shall be limited to fifteen each yearThey shall be issued only one award of the many, if any.

Medical institutions or relevant groups meeting regulations of Subparagraph 2 through Subparagraph 6 of Article 3, shall be issued disease control bonus of no more than NT$ 100,000.
Targets for awards of the preceding Paragraph shall be limited to fifteen each yearThey shall be issued only one award of the many, if any.
Awards of this set of Regulations shall be decided by the central competent authority; local competent authorities shall act accordingly.
This set of Regulations shall enter into force on the day of announcement, with the exception of Articles that were amended and announced on June 4, 2019, and shall enter into force on April 1, 2019.
